Counting the number of laws signed by Pr: he has been more productive than any president since Harry Truman, according to press secretary Sean Spicer.
Trump has signed a total of 28 bills so: which is more than any president in the past 70 years.
However: the significance of these bills is questioned, as none of them are particularly significant or groundbreaking.
Comparatively: President Truman signed 55 bills in his first 100 days, and President Roosevelt signed 76, demonstrating that Trump's number of bills signed is not unprecedented.
